name: GPT-750M-1024-Phase1.5-Induction-Beta
description: Phase 1.5b: continue from GOLD checkpoint (step 156k, val=3.38) with higher LR to strengthen weak induction heads. LR 1e-4 (up from 6e-5 which plateaued at 3.38-3.50). Short warmup (2k steps) since model is already trained. Fresh optimizer state. 330k iters on same 4.02B token dataset. Litmus test: must break below 3.38 by step 20k or LR is not the bottleneck.
